alert.note: Alert for Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 3:36AM PST until March 09 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING ABOVE 1500 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING ABOVE 3500 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory above 1500 feet, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch above 3500 feet, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern Trinity County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
